forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
